name: MoMo The Horror Game
description:
Night, fear, horror story will open its doors.
You woke up in an incomprehensible house, you need to escape, and you only have a mobile phone.
Who is calling? Yes. Calls you Momo, so that you would go crazy.
Welcome to the new interactive horror, in which you need to do everything that would not get caught by the Japanese monster Momo.
Run, look around, and do not take the phone, it will call you, write.
If you do not take the correct step, it will find you.
